pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 6, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, July 6, 2017:

Edinburgh, United Kingdom

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Hamburg, Germany.

Edinburgh Airport


Hamburg, Germany

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Hamburg, Germany.

Hamburg Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of arrival

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Global Citizen Festival Hamburg. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks.

Barclaycard Arena

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


Note: all times local
